label: List of slaves from Fairfield Plantation
description: A list of enslaved people taken by W.A. Alston in the division of his father's estate. List includes the names and prices of enslaved women, men, and children. List also includes various information about enslaved individuals, such as plantation of origin, work skills, physical ailments, and ages of children.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: A list of enslaved people taken by W.A. Alston in the division of his father's estate. List includes the names and prices of enslaved women, men, and children. List also includes various information about enslaved individuals, such as plantation of origin, work skills, physical ailments, and ages of children.

metadata.label: Access Note
metadata.value: For more information, contact Special Collections, College of Charleston Libraries, 66 George St., Charleston, SC 29424.

metadata.label: Digitization Specifications
metadata.value: 600 dpi, 24-bit depth, color, Epson Expression 10000XL. Archival masters are tiffs.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
List of the Negroes taken by W A Alston in the division of his Father's Estate: Lawrence $850, Charity 700, Child of 8 mos [months] Dinah 100, Charlo 850, Elizabeth 350, 1 Child of 3 yrs [years] (Scilla) 200, 1 Child of 10 mos Di' 100, Girl Rinah 650, Joe Moultrie 800, Betty 700, 1 Child Charlotte over 12 yrs 325, 1 Child Patience 1 yr 100, Joe Fly 800, Bella 700, Ben 800, Ria--astmahtic [asthmatic] 550, 1 Child 3 yrs (Phillis) 200, Young Johnny 800, Minda (Crab Hall) 700, Manuel (Strawberry) 800, Minerva 700, 1 Child Queen 1 1/2 yr 100, Cooper Tom 900, Sarah (Crab Hall) 200, 1 Child Rebecca 9 yrs 275, 1 Child Sam 5 1/2 yrs 225, 1 Child Aleck 4 1/2 yrs 225, 1 Child Titus 3 yrs 200, Weehawka Johnny 800, Phabe 700, 1 Child Casey over 12 yrs 325, 1 Child Fortune over 9-- 275, 1 Child Sambo over 8--275, Weehawka Tober 800, Zilpah 350, 1 Child Sally over 3 yrs 200, Strawberry Cato (Lad) 700, Toney Moultrie 800, Nanny 700, 1 Child Cuffey 7 yrs 250, 1 Child Romeo 2 yrs 100, Weehawka Tommy (Lad) 600, William 800, Sarah 700, 1 Child Bridget 100 [page 2 of list] List continued of Negroes taken by W.A.A, Amt [Amount] bro't [brought] over $22375, Frank in mill 750, Rose (Fairfield) 700, Strawberry Frank 800, Amaritta 700, Dour Bella 3/4 Girl 550, 1 Child Betsey 9 yrs 275, 1 Child Sylvia 5 yrs 225, Cooper Gabriel 800, Bina 400, Abram (hernia) 500, Phillis 700, Daniel (hernia) 500, Long Eve, 1 Child Binkey over 4 225, 1 Child Judith 100, Trumpeter 800, Eleanor 550, Ten more Weehawka 250, Phillis D. 200, Boy John 1/4 450, 1 Child Sue 6 yrs 225, Jack Motte 800, Myra, 1 Child 1 mo (Jacob) 100, Cooper Isaac 450, Lavinia (Crab Hall) 700, Cretia's Judy 700, Grace (Sam's) 700, Elsey (Bina's) 700, Big Venus 700, Son Cuffey 1/2 600, Son Hannibal 1/4 450 Son Sambo 12 yrs 300, Judy Washington 700, 1 Child Lucy over 2 yrs 200, Judy (Fairfield) 200, Dour Bess 3/4 550, 1 Child Pashina 6 yrs 225, 1 Child Cibbey 4 yrs 200, Cooper Zias 300, Scilla 500, 1 Child Phillis 7 yrs 250, 1 Child Penda 1 1/2 yr 100, 1 Child of 10 Days (Judy) 100 [cumulative total] $43200 [page 3 of list] List continued of Negroes taken by WAA in division of his Father's Est.--Amt bro't forward $43200, Dembow (Strawberry) 650, Peter 500, Nelly 250, July 300, Elsey 700, 1 Child Phillis 11 yrs 300, 1 Child Cuffey 9 yrs 275, Long Ned (Weehawka) 450, Diana (Weehawka) 250, Bess--Poultry Minder 100, Dour Manda 3/4 550, Dour Molly 3/4 550, Dour Hagar 1/4 400, Pheebe's Ben 3/4 650, Orphan Maryann 12 yrs 325, Old Pheebe 150, Boy Billy 1/2 -drowned 600, Girl Nanny 1/2 500m Girl Pheebe 3/4 (Bella's) 550, Old Bella 000, Old Eliza 1/4 200, Boy Adam 3/4 650, Girl Charlotte 1/2 500, Boy Sam 1/4 450, 1 Child Thomas 6 yrs 225, Bristol 300, Molly Carter (Nurse) 500, 1 Child Rebecca 10 yrs 275, 1 Child August 4 1/2 yrs 225, Girl Judy 1/2 500, Little Venus 350, Old Adam 100, Camilla 100, Girl Lavinia 3/4 550, Girl Charlotte 1/4 400, 1 Child Judy 5 yrs 225, Old Charity 000, Son Chance 350, Driver Joe Campbell, Wife Linda 250, Girl Abby 3/4 550, Boy Warley 450, 1 Child Cibbey 6 yrs 225, 1 Child Janet 1 1/2 yr 100, Young Neptune (Strawberry) 800 [cumulative total] $59525 [page 4 of list] List continued of Negroes taken by WAA in the division of his Father's Est--Amt bro't over $59525, Driver Keith, Old Dinah 000, Nancy (Cook for Overseer) 350, Larry (300), Old Carp'r [Carpenter] John, Wife Dolly 000, Plenty Miller ill & not valued, Lizette 200, Old Neptune 600, Wife Doll 200, Girl Lavinia 3/4 550, Boy Abram 350, Phillis (Neptune's) 200, Isaac (Crab Hall) 800, Sally (Do) 650, 1 Child Patsey 7 yrs 250, 1 Child Billy 3 yrs (200), 1 Child Josey 1 1/2 yr 100, Quashy (Crab Hall) 800, Lydia 600, David Blacksmith 500, Judy Drayton 650, Boy Pompey with Blksmith [Blacksmith] 550, Tailor Isaac 425, Tailor Sam 600, Annie--his sister 300, Old Philander (Strawberry) 50, Chloe--his wife (Do) 200, Beck (Do) 550, Job 600, Prince 200, Peter 200, Maryann (Crab Hall) 450, Boy Dick 1/2 Do 500, 1 Child 7 yrs Do 250, 1 Child Tom 5 yrs 225, 1 Child Lucy 1 1/2 yr 100, Old Titus (Crab Hall) 000, Statira 400, Boy Cain 400, Ora--ok for children 100, Girl Mary 350, Old Patty (Crab Hall) 200 [cumulative total] $73525 [page 5 of list] List of Negroes taken by WAA in division of Father's Est., Amt bro't forward $73525, African John 250, Afr. [African] Warley 200, Afr. Jackey 200, Afr. Beck 200, Bricklayer Titus 200, Robin--sickly 300, Hannah 650, 1 Chd [Child] Judy 12 yrs 300, 1 Chd Plenty 9 yrs 275, 1 Chd Johnny 8 yrs 250, 1 Chd Jem 4 yrs 200, 1 Chd Delia 100, Carpenter Billy, Sue--his wife 400, Carp'r Putnam, Bella--his wife 500, Dour Sarah 350, Son Marcus 350, Son James 250, Son Cato 250, Son [MS torn] 100, Carpenter Robert, Bess--his wife 100, Carpenter Virgil, Sue--his wife 500, Dour Maryann 150, 1 Child July 100, Carp'r Jim Pinckney, Charlotte--his wife 600, 1 Child 150, Carp'r Jim Gillon, 
Di--his wife--washer 300, Dour Becky 600, Do Sylvia 550, Do Molly 400, Do Nancy 300, Son Henry 280, Son James 200, Dour Susey--cripple 000, Alfred House Serv't [servant] 400, Rachel--washer 500, Son Alfred 300, Son Lanceford 150, Child John 100
